briefdescription.para: Finds a parameter from an array by name.

detaileddescription.para:
name
Name of the parameter to search.
nparam
Number of parameters in the param array.
param
Parameter array to search.
Pointer to the parameter in the param or NULL if no parameter with name name was found. The comparison is case-sensitive.

briefdescription.para: Does a type conversion on a SelectionParserValue.

parameterdescription.para: Errors will be reported into this as nested exceptions.

briefdescription.para: Does a type conversion on a list of values.
Adds a child element for a parameter, keeping the parameter order.

detaileddescription.para:
root
Root element to which the child is added.
child
Child to add.
param
Parameter for which this child is a value.
Puts child in the child list of root such that the list remains in the same order as the corresponding parameters.

briefdescription.para: Comparison function for sorting integer ranges.

detaileddescription.para:
a
Pointer to the first range.
b
Pointer to the second range.
-1, 0, or 1 depending on the relative order of a and b. The ranges are primarily sorted based on their starting point, and secondarily based on length (longer ranges come first).

briefdescription.para: Comparison function for sorting real ranges.

detaileddescription.para:
a
Pointer to the first range.
b
Pointer to the second range.
-1, 0, or 1 depending on the relative order of a and b. The ranges are primarily sorted based on their starting point, and secondarily based on length (longer ranges come first).

briefdescription.para: Parses the values for a parameter that takes integer or real ranges.
Parses the values for a parameter that takes a variable number of values.

detaileddescription.para:
values
List of values.
param
Parameter to parse.
root
Selection element to which child expressions are added.
scanner
Scanner data structure.
For integer ranges, the sequence of numbers from the first to second value is stored, each as a separate value.

briefdescription.para: Adds a new subexpression reference to a selection element.

detaileddescription.para:
root
Root element to which the subexpression is added.
param
Parameter for which this expression is a value.
expr
Expression to add.
scanner
Scanner data structure.
The created child element. Creates a new SEL_SUBEXPRREF element and adds it into the child list of root. If expr is already a SEL_SUBEXPRREF, it is used as it is. SEL_ALLOCVAL is cleared for the returned element.

briefdescription.para: Parses an expression value for a parameter that takes a variable number of values.

parameterdescription.para: Selection element to which child expressions are added.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the storage of an expression value.

detaileddescription.para:
sel
Selection element that evaluates the value.
param
Parameter to receive the value.
i
The value of sel evaluates the value i for param.
scanner
Scanner data structure.
Initializes the data pointer of sel such that the result is stored as the value i of param. This function is used internally by parse_values_std().

briefdescription.para: Parses the values for a parameter that takes a constant number of values.

detaileddescription.para:
values
List of values.
param
Parameter to parse.
root
Selection element to which child expressions are added.
scanner
Scanner data structure.
For integer ranges, the sequence of numbers from the first to second value is stored, each as a separate value.

briefdescription.para: Parses the values for a boolean parameter.

parameterdescription.para: Name by which the parameter was given.

briefdescription.para: Parses the values for an enumeration parameter.

simplesect.para: true if the values were parsed successfully, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Replaces constant expressions with their values.

parameterdescription.para: First element in the value list to process.

memberdef.argsstring: (const gmx::SelectionParserParameterList &pparams, int nparam, gmx_ana_selparam_t *params, const gmx::SelectionTreeElementPointer &root, void *scanner)
memberdef.name: _gmx_sel_parse_params

briefdescription.para: Initializes an array of parameters based on input from the selection parser.

detaileddescription.para:
pparams
List of parameters from the selection parser.
nparam
Number of parameters in params.
params
Array of parameters to parse.
root
Selection element to which child expressions are added.
scanner
Scanner data structure.
Initializes the params array based on the parameters in pparams. See the documentation of gmx_ana_selparam_t for different options available for parsing.
The list pparams and any associated values are freed after the parameters have been processed, no matter is there was an error or not.
